/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. Cars of various colors are scattered across the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene. In the distance, mountains rise against the horizon, adding a touch of natural beauty to the urban landscape.
